name: Soulless (RabidBlueberry)
description:
You play as Mort, a young man who lives alone with his dog. One day, the devil stole your dog because he was cute. Wanting your dog back, you traverse to the underworld, gaining the ability to release his soul from his body. Go get that dog back.

WASD - Movement 

Space Bar - Jump 

Shift - Exit Body 

Left Click - Grab Body 

Right Click - Throw Body
